channel.title: Researches on Chong-Chong He
channel.description: Recent content in Researches on Chong-Chong He

item.description: I use a state-of-art radiation-magnetohydrodynamics code RAMSES-RT to simulate star formation in molecular clouds. In particular, I am looking to understand the role the first dense star clusters play in the reionization of the universe and in the production of supermassive black hole seeds. Resolved simulations of star cluster formation from molecular clouds Left: Line-of-sight projections of the gas density from a simulation with cloud mass $3 \times 10^4 \ {\rm M}_{\odot}$ and mean density $2000 \ {\rm cm}^{-3}$.
